articles.title: Staff at Boston Medical Center in Boston, Massachusetts, Celebrate Receipt of Coronavirus Vaccine With TikTok Dance Video - Newser
articles.description: Staff at Boston Medical Center bust out the dance moves to Lizzo's 'Good as Hell'
articles.content:
(Newser)
Boston Medical Center was one of the first hospitals in Massachusetts to receive a shipment of the coronavirus vaccine Monday, and the 1,950 doses will start to be divvied out to front-line… [+1390 chars]
